title: Traded a factory reset pixel 2 for a 3a and Google downgraded my trade to $20. What can I do?
content: I was offered $197 for the trade and they claim the phone was not factory reset, which is a lie, and only credited me $20. That's$20 for a $600 phone.  Google is basically trying to Rob me and I opened a case which no one has got back to me. What else can I do?
